settings.title: WOOD
settings.text: Explore the materials and craftsmanship of our wooden creations, meticulously crafted from premium materials to elevate your style and comfort.

settings.heading: Breathable & lightweight wooden bases
settings.row_content: Our wooden bases are meticulously carved from the finest Lime wood and Spanish Pine. These materials promise durability and a unique character that evolves gracefully with time. This, in combination with the fact that wood is a breathable material, makes wooden base clogs the perfect companion to your feet for every occasion.

settings.heading: Rubber sole for unmatched traction
settings.row_content: Step confidently on any terrain with our rubber sole, offering traction and support. Whether navigating bustling city streets or embracing outdoor adventures, our rubber soles provide the perfect blend of comfort and stability.

settings.heading: Diverse base colors: dark, light & black
settings.row_content: Express your individuality with our diverse color options. Choose from the timeless elegance of dark, the understated charm of light, or the classic versatility of black. Each base is thoughtfully designed to complement your wardrobe, allowing you to curate your own signature style.

settings.text: Welcome to our world where style meets substance, and your footwear becomes an expression of your unique personality.

settings.title: CORK
settings.text: Indulge in the perfect blend of style and comfort with our meticulously handcrafted cork base creations. Our commitment to quality is evident in every detail.

settings.heading: Footbed: natural cork and rubber
settings.row_content: Immerse your feet in the luxury of a footbed crafted from natural cork sourced from Spain and Portugal. This premium material not only provides a unique texture but also offers a touch of nature's elegance. The addition of natural rubber ensures lasting comfort with each step. Our commitment to quality extends to the footbed, crafted from spanish nubuck leather measuring 0.8mm in thickness. This luxurious touch not only adds sophistication but also guarantees a plush feel for your feet.

settings.heading: Outsole: 10mm EVA rubber
settings.row_content: Experience the perfect balance of flexibility and durability with our 10mm EVA rubber outsole. Designed to withstand diverse terrains, it provides reliable support for your active lifestyle.

settings.heading: Adjustable straps & nickel-free buckles
settings.row_content: Enjoy a personalized fit with our adjustable straps, adorned with nickel-free metal buckles. Beyond style, these straps ensure maximum support tailored to your preferences.

settings.text: Elevate your footwear experience with our thoughtfully designed cork base shoes, where every element is chosen to enhance your comfort and style. Step into a world where craftsmanship meets elegance, and every detail matters.

settings.title: LEATHERS
settings.text: Discover the artistry and care that goes into selecting our premium leathers at Sandgrens - a testament to our commitment to quality and authenticity.

settings.heading: Vegetable tanned leather
settings.row_content:
Our chrome-free vegetable tanned leather is a testament to both environmental consciousness and timeless craftsmanship. Through a natural and chemical-free tanning process, this leather is artfully created using tree bark, vegetables, and fruits. This eco-friendly method not only ensures a gentle touch on the environment but also aligns seamlessly with our dedication to sustainable choices.

In its initial state, vegetable tanned leather may present a firmer texture compared to chemically dyed counterparts. However, this characteristic transforms into a distinctive feature as the leather softens with the passage of time, offering a personalized touch with every use.

One of our noteworthy offerings in this collection is the ecru color – a natural hue that adds an understated elegance to your footwear. Ecru holds a unique charm as it gracefully develops a patina over time, telling a story of its journey and adding character to your footwear. This natural aging process not only enhances the aesthetic appeal but also showcases the authenticity of the material.

With chrome-free vegetable tanned leather, you not only embrace an eco-conscious choice but also invest in a material that evolves gracefully, reflecting the values of slow fashion and enduring quality.

settings.heading: Nubuck full grain leather
settings.row_content:
Found just below the hair, full grain leather is the strongest and most durable part of the hide. Derived from the uppermost layer of the animal hide, this type of leather retains its natural grain, showcasing a distinct and authentic texture. Full grain nubuck leather epitomizes a luxurious and refined leather experience known for its exceptional durability and resistance to wear.

Over time, full grain nubuck leather develops a patina that further enhances its character, making each piece unique and telling a story of its journey. As a premium material that combines resilience, softness, and a timeless aesthetic, full grain nubuck leather continues to captivate discerning those who seek the pinnacle of quality and craftsmanship.

Comparatively softer than vegetable tanned leather, nubuck requires a shorter break-in period. Your feet will enjoy immediate comfort from the first wear, and the leather easily adapts to your foot shape.

settings.heading: Nubuck top grain leather
settings.row_content:
Top grain leather stands as a testament to the epitome of quality and refinement in the world of leather goods.

Known for its durability and resilience, top grain leather undergoes a meticulous tanning process that maintains the integrity of the hide while ensuring a soft and supple feel. Unlike full-grain leather, top grain leather may undergo minimal sanding or buffing to remove imperfections, resulting in a smooth and uniform surface.

Appreciated for its balance between durability and aesthetics, top grain leather caters to those who seek a combination of sophistication and practicality. As a material that ages gracefully, top grain leather not only withstands the test of time but also gains a unique charm, making it a timeless investment for those who value both quality and style.

settings.heading: Genuine leather
settings.row_content:
Our genuine leather with foil finish represents a unique fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary aesthetics. In this process, real animal hide is carefully treated and adorned with a thin layer of foil, creating a distinctive surface that combines durability with an eye-catching visual appeal.

The application of foil to the leather serves multiple purposes. Beyond its decorative function, the foil contributes to the leather's protective qualities, enhancing its resistance to wear and tear. The result is a leather product that not only looks refined but also stands up to the rigors of everyday use.
